name: Bernadette Farias Lóscio
content: Berna ﻿ ﻿ Home Teaching Publications Research Projects ﻿ Bernadette Farias Lóscio Centro de Informática - Universidade Federal de Pernambuco Tel +55 81 2126.8430 - Cidade Universitaria - 50740-560 - Recife/PE Sala: B001 Ramal: 4750 bfl@cin.ufpe.br Bernadette is an assistant professor at Center for Informatics (CIn) at Federal University of Pernambuco - UFPE, Brazil. She received her D.Sc.. degree in computer science from Federal University of Pernambuco. She also holds M.Sc. degree from the Federal University of Ceará and B.Sc. degree from the State University of Ceará. CV lattes (at CNPq). Research interests: Data integration, Dataspaces, PDMS, Semantic Web, Linked data, XML, Information quality and Decision support systems.
